pin1Desc: Pick the assessment kit that matches your goals.
pin3Desc: Explore your detailed insights and action points.
pin4Desc: Send results to teammates or stakeholders.

faq1.question: Is it complicated to set up?
faq1.answer: No — You can launch your first assessment in minutes. No coding, no heavy onboarding.

faq2.question: Will it really give me actionable insights?
faq2.answer: Yes — Flickit doesn’t just show you data; it maps out exactly where you stand and what to do next.

faq3.question: We’re unique — will it work for us?
faq3.answer: Absolutely — Flickit’s flexible kits adapt to your team’s workflows and your business needs.

readyMade.title: Ready-made kits.
readyMade.desc: Choose from curated assessments designed for common roles, domains, and maturity objectives—no setup required.

analytics.title: Actionable analytics
analytics.desc: Instantly turn responses into maturity scores, strengths, gaps, and prioritized next steps you can act on right away.

effortless.title: Effortless questionnaires
effortless.desc: Skip logic makes answering fast, clear, and frustration-free.

expertGuidance.title: Expert guidance on demand
expertGuidance.desc: Book sessions with certified assessors for deep-dive reviews, interpretation, or roadmap validation whenever you need.

customAssessment.title: Custom assessments, made for you
customAssessment.desc: Need something specific? We'll connect you with an expert who can design a tailored assessment kit that fits your team’s exact context and goals.

aiPowered.title: AI-powered insights
aiPowered.desc: Leverage advanced AI to uncover hidden patterns, benchmark against peers, and forecast ROI for improvement actions.

teamCollab.title: Real-time team collaboration
teamCollab.desc: Invite colleagues to co-fill questionnaires, see each other’s progress instantly, and lock answers when consensus is reached.

sharing.title: 3-Click report sharing
sharing.desc: Share reports with stakeholders via a secure link in seconds.

softwarePerformance.title: Ensure your product's readiness for scaling with this assessment kit
softwarePerformance.desc: Make sure your product is ready to scale with Software Performance Evaluation. Assess its ability to handle growth and avoid technical or business setbacks before scaling.
softwarePerformance.caseStudyDesc: Amazon: How Latency Optimization Boosted Revenue

toolMaturity.title: How Tool Maturity enhances both speed and quality
toolMaturity.desc: Users don't wait. This kit checks the health of your software performance (Latency, Throughput, Resource Use) and fixes bottlenecks before they become a problem during high-demand periods.
toolMaturity.caseStudyDesc: How Etsy Accelerated Deployment up to 50 deploy per day with DevOps Automation?

internalAudit.title: Ensuring long-term viability and sustainability of software
internalAudit.desc: Features alone aren’t enough — this kit helps you assess the technical and economic health of your product to ensure long-term sustainability.
internalAudit.caseStudyDesc: Facebook Messenger: How Technical Debt Was Eliminated for Faster Performance

vendorEvaluation.title: Assessing AI integration for product development
vendorEvaluation.desc: Evaluate how effectively AI is being used across your product development lifecycle. This kit helps you identify gaps, reduce risks, and unlock opportunities for smarter, faster innovation.
